name: Amputee Rick's Confused Anesthesia Adventure
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 over the course of 48 hours.

Theme

The theme for this jam was "Only One". I chose to go with a brawler / beat-em-up type game where you only have one arm. 

Controls

Move: Arrows

Punch: Z

Story

With a freshly amputated arm, Rick wanders out of the hospital. Still deeply confused from the abundance of anesthesia in his body, Rick believes that he a character in a beat-em-up video game. He wanders the streets, beating up all those who stand in his way - though they are innocent people, or family members desperately trying to get him back in the hospital.

How to Play

  • Punch enemies with Z
  • There is a 25% chance that Rick will try to punch with his amputated arm, which will do no damage. (He's still getting used to having no arm)
  • The game ends when you defeat your mom.

Credits

Damon Bolesta (dbolesta@gmail.com): Design, Programming, Art, Music

Made in JavaScript using the Phaser Framework (v2.6.2). Music was made in Logic Pro X. Pixel art was created in Photoshop. 

(Let it be known that I am not satisfied with how this game turned out.)
